mapper.select: select distinct t.partition_id as partitionId, t.group_name_cn as groupNameCn, t.group_name_en as groupNameEn from ctas_agt_group t order by t.partition_id

SELECT t.agent_code as agentCode FROM ctas_agt_group t WHERE 1=1
AND t. partition_id = #{partitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_CTAS_AGT_GROUP.nextval as recId from dual
insert into CTAS_AGT_GROUP (REC_ID, PARTITION_OWNER, PARTITION_ID, AGENT_CODE, CRT_OPE_TIME,COMPANY_CODE, DI, GROUP_NAME_CN, GROUP_NAME_EN) values (#{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{partitionOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtOpeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{di,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CTAS_AGT_GROUP set PARTITION_OWNER = #{partitionOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTITION_ID = #{partitionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DI = #{di,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GROUP_NAME_CN = #{groupNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_NAME_EN = #{groupNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT T.REC_ID, T.PARTITION_OWNER, T.PARTITION_ID, T.AGENT_CODE, T.CRT_OPE_TIME, T.COMPANY_CODE, T.DI, T.GROUP_NAME_CN, T.GROUP_NAME_EN from CTAS_AGT_GROUP T WHERE T.REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
